summary.para: The KERB_QUERY_TKT_CACHE_RESPONSE structure contains the results of querying the ticket cache.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_TKT_CACHE_RESPONSE.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of request being made. This member must be set to KerbQueryTicketCacheMessage.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_TKT_CACHE_RESPONSE.CountOfTickets
member.summary: Number of tickets in Tickets array. This can be zero if no tickets are available for the specified logon session.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_TKT_CACHE_RESPONSE.Tickets
member.summary: Array of length CountOfTickets of structures.
